title: The Water Devil, Issue
description: Orin Bean and Dragon continue their journey north to the Realm of the Ice Goblins in their quest to undo Orin's curse. However, a new and terrifying monster is chasing them.Will they survive the attack of this powerful creature? Will they ever meet up with Orin's Nana and his friend Lucy?Discover this new exciting chapter of the award winning series!
author: Carolyn Watson-Dubisch
